entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
